lead_paragraph: With the Yankees refusing to make good on $6 million for tying Willie Mays’s home run mark, Rodriguez said he was “just happy to be playing baseball.”

headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Avoids Discussing Cashman’s Stand on Bonus
headline.main: Alex Rodriguez Avoids Discussing Cashman’s Stand on Bonus

snippet: With the Yankees refusing to make good on $6 million for tying Willie Mays’s home run mark, Rodriguez said he was “just happy to be playing baseball.”
